Header.title: Ealing Board Games
Header.paragraph: A bunch of people that just like to sit around and play board games. We are a community of beginners and veterans alike.If you are interested in board games, whether it be learning or playing, we have a seat for you. Facebook    If you're not on Facebook, fear not. We meet every Wednesday between 18:30-20:30 at the Ealing Project. Come say hello!
